Nuestros campeones de Rallyes #23

Ahead of his time
The Lancia Stratos was the first car designed specifically for rallying. With a Ferrari engine in central position, back and rear wheel drive, was the first great revolution in the art world and won three consecutive frames. In Spain, the Stratos was linked to Jorge de Bagration, who ran with him six seasons and won two national titles.
